    • Uses of IOFSwitch in net.beaconcontroller.core

      Methods in net.beaconcontroller.core that return types with arguments of type IOFSwitch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Long,IOFSwitch> IBeaconProvider.getSwitches()
      Returns a read-only map of all OpenFlow switches in the ACTIVE state
      Methods in net.beaconcontroller.core with parameters of type IOFSwitch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IOFSwitchListener.addedSwitch(IOFSwitch sw)
      Fired when a switch is connected to the controller, and has sent a features reply.
      void IBeaconProvider.initializerComplete(IOFSwitch sw, IOFInitializerListener listener)
      Once an initializer has initialized a switch it calls this method which removes the initializer for the specified switch, sending OFMessages to the next listener in sequence, or making the switch active if the sequence for the specified switch becomes empty.
      void IOFInitializerListener.initializerReceive(IOFSwitch sw, OFMessage msg)
      This is the method Beacon uses to call initialization listeners with incoming OpenFlow messages
      void IOFInitializerListener.initializerStart(IOFSwitch sw)
      Called when it is this initializer's turn to hold the initializer 'lock' on the switch.
      boolean IOFSwitchFilter.isInterested(IOFSwitch sw)
      The result of this method call determines whether the IOFMessageListener's receive method is called or not.
      IOFMessageListener.Command IOFMessageListener.receive(IOFSwitch sw, OFMessage msg)
      This is the method Beacon uses to call listeners with OpenFlow messages
      void IOFSwitchListener.removedSwitch(IOFSwitch sw)
      Fired when a switch is disconnected from the controller.

      Subinterfaces of IOFSwitch in net.beaconcontroller.core.internal 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IOFSwitchExt
      This interface is an extension of IOFSwitch, but is only used internally for access to members that should not be exposed externally to other packages.
